about_the_game:
Deep in the northern sea...

...A statue roams the halls.

Play through the story of SCP: Submerged. An SCP game set in the bottom of the Northern Sea, where monstrous entities have been set free. Complete your objectives, navigate the facility, work with unlikely allies, but most importantly... Don't. Blink.

Explore

Navigate the cold and dark halls and rooms of ARC-Site 51, and find your way up throughout the floors of the underwater structure.

Survive

Dodge the deadly touch of the plague doctor, and don't trust all the voices you hear... Many deadly entities roam on every floor.

An homage to SCP Unity

In honor of SCP Unity which was cancelled, we are re-purposing their SCP models for SCP: Submerged.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains blood, depictions of dead bodies, and violence towards the player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or Intel Core i5-9400F (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might not run well on older Windows Versions
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or Intel Core i7-11700K (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might not run well on older Windows Versions

short_description: SCP: Submerged is a story-driven game set in the SCP Universe. Deadly entities are on the lose in the facility, located leagues below the waves of the northern sea.
